tasks.label: Compile and Run DSA Program (Linux)
args: g++ "${file}" -std=c++20 -O2 -Wall -o "${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExtension}" && if [ -f "${workspaceFolder}/input.txt" ]; then "${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExtension}" < "${workspaceFolder}/input.txt" > "${workspaceFolder}/output.txt"; else "${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExtension}"; fi; rm -f "${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExtension}"
